channel.title: Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.1)
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Avatar Optimizer (1.5.1)

item.title: Changelog
item.description: Changelog # All notable changes to this project are documented in this page. The format is based on Keep a Changelog. 1.5.1 - 2023-10-08 # Fixed # MergePhysBone component may be shown as unknown components #541 MergeBone may break Fur #542 1.5.0 - 2023-10-07 # Added # Support for NDMF integration #375 Pre-building validation for MergeBone #417 There are some (rare) cases that are not supported by MergeBone. This adds warning for such case.
